channel.title: CVE Feed for SagerNet -- sing-box
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SagerNet -- sing-box

item.title: CVE-2023-43644|2024-09-24T19:29:54.599Z -- sagernet -- sing-box
item.description: Sing-box is an open source proxy system. Affected versions are subject to an authentication bypass when specially crafted requests are sent to sing-box. This affects all SOCKS5 inbounds with user authentication and an attacker may be able to bypass authentication. Users are advised to update to sing-box 1.4.4 or to 1.5.0-rc.4. Users unable to update should not expose the SOCKS5 inbound to insecure environments.
